Structs/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/transport.name: transport
Structs/LGV_MeetingSDK.html#/transport.abstract: This is the transport layer for the TCP connection to the meeting list server.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: isValid
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL, AND SHOULD GENERALLY NOT BE IMPLEMENTED** This is false, if the combination of meeting values does not represent a valid meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: nextMeetingStartsOn
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL. The next meeting (from now) will start on this date (time).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: weekday
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL The repeating weekday for the meeting (1-based, with 1 being Sunday, and 7 being Saturday).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingStartTime
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL The start time of the meeting, as military time (HHMM). This only applies, if (1...7).contains(weekday).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingLocalTimezone
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL** The local timezone of the meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingDuration
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL** The duration of the meeting, in seconds.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: formats
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has formats, then this contains a list of them. Empty, if no formats.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: comments
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has comments associated, they will be here, as a String. Empty, if no comments.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: virtualMeetingInfo
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has a virtual presence, this will have that information. Nil, if no virtual meeting.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: physicalLocation
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has a physical presence, this will have the location. Nil, if no physical location.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: meetingURI
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has a URI (not a virtual meeting URI -for example, a Group Web site), that is available here.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: description
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: REQUIRED** This describes the meeting venue (i.e. “Video,” “Zoom,” “Audio-Only,” “Phone,” etc.).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: url
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has a URI, that is available here.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: meetingID
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has a separate meeting ID, that is available here, as a String.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: password
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: OPTIONAL** If the meeting has a separate meeting password, that is available here, as a String.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.name: placemark
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.abstract: REQUIRED** The location is stored as a standard placemark.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.name: locationCoordinates
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.abstract: OPTIONAL** This displays the coordinates (degrees Long/Lat). Nil, if no coordinates (address only).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.name: formatName
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Format_Protocol.abstract: The name for this format (a short descriptive string).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physical_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Physica.abstract: This defines the meeting’s physical location component.

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Virtual.abstract: This defines the meeting’s virtual component (if any).

Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.name: LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protocol
Protocols/LGV_MeetingSDK_Meeting_Protoco.abstract: Each meeting instance will present itself as conforming to this protocol.
